complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix Failing Tests in Workflow Manager
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of fixing failing tests in the workflow manager into specific subtasks, including test analysis, root cause identification, implementation fixes for transaction handling, error recovery, state management, agent communication, workflow persistence, and race condition resolution. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves debugging complex workflow orchestration issues across multiple components. The high complexity comes from needing to understand transaction handling, error recovery, state management, and asynchronous operations. The task requires deep system knowledge and careful analysis of test failures. The implementation touches critical core functionality with potential for regression issues.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of fixing agent recovery tests into specific subtasks, including test failure analysis, debugging the recovery mechanism in BaseAgent, implementing state persistence, fixing shutdown/restart procedures, addressing agent registration issues, and resolving capability routing after recovery. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves fixing agent recovery mechanisms which requires understanding of agent lifecycle, state persistence, and recovery protocols. The complexity stems from handling various failure scenarios and ensuring proper state management during recovery. The task touches core agent functionality and requires careful testing of edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the JSON serialization crisis resolution into specific subtasks, including class identification for serialization, custom encoder/decoder implementation for complex objects, RDF graph serialization, validation mechanisms, helper function creation, comprehensive testing, versioning implementation, and documentation. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has high complexity due to the need to implement custom serialization for complex objects including RDF graphs. It requires deep understanding of the object model, handling of circular references, and implementing versioning. The task is critical as it blocks workflow persistence and agent state management, affecting the entire system's stability.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix Constructor Mismatches in Agent Classes
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of fixing constructor mismatches in agent classes into specific subtasks, including comprehensive review of all agent constructors, parameter signature alignment, default value correction, documentation updates, and backward compatibility implementation. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires understanding the inheritance hierarchy of agent classes and ensuring constructor compatibility. The complexity comes from maintaining backward compatibility while fixing parameter mismatches. It's a critical task as it affects the instantiation of all agent types in the system.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix Comparison Errors in Core Components
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of fixing comparison errors in core components into specific subtasks, including identifying components with comparison issues, implementing proper equality and hash methods, fixing type comparison problems, ensuring consistent comparison behavior, addressing collection sorting issues, and adding validation for comparisons. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves fixing comparison operations across multiple core components. The complexity stems from ensuring consistent behavior for equality, identity, and hashing operations. These issues can cause subtle bugs in collections and dictionaries. The task requires careful testing to ensure all comparison scenarios work correctly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of consolidating entry points into specific subtasks, including analysis of current entry point functionality, design of a unified CLI interface, implementation of command routing, and ensuring backward compatibility. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves refactoring multiple entry points into a single unified interface. While conceptually straightforward, it requires careful analysis of existing functionality and ensuring backward compatibility. The task has medium complexity as it touches system initialization but has well-defined boundaries.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the knowledge graph performance enhancement task into specific subtasks, including performance profiling, caching implementation, versioning system, validation rules framework, query optimization, indexing strategies, and batch operations support. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task already has well-defined subtasks that appropriately break down the complex work of optimizing RDF-based semantic store performance. The high complexity comes from needing to implement caching, versioning, validation, query optimization, indexing, and batch operations while maintaining correctness. Performance optimization requires careful benchmarking and testing with large datasets.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Midjourney integration task into specific subtasks, including code review of current integration, API endpoint implementation, agent wrapper creation, frontend updates, error handling and rate limiting, image caching and management, and documentation. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.

The complexity comes from implementing proper API communication, error handling, rate limiting, and frontend integration. It requires understanding both the Midjourney API and how it fits into the existing system architecture.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Refine with AI' frontend functionality implementation into specific subtasks, including UI design, frontend component implementation, backend API endpoint creation, AI model integration, and history tracking with undo/redo capabilities. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves implementing a new frontend feature with corresponding backend support. The complexity comes from designing a good user experience for AI refinement, implementing history tracking, and integrating with AI models. It requires both frontend and backend work with careful attention to user experience.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task of implementing missing agent methods into specific subtasks, including identification of agents with missing methods, implementation according to interface specifications, error handling, logging, documentation updates, compatibility verification, and adding type hints. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires implementing missing methods across multiple agent classes. The complexity comes from ensuring consistent implementation across different agent types while maintaining compatibility with existing workflows. Each method needs proper error handling, logging, and documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the capability-based routing enhancement task into specific subtasks, including review of current mechanisms, implementation of sophisticated matching algorithms, capability versioning and compatibility, negotiation between agents, metrics for routing decisions, and fallback mechanisms. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves enhancing a core system feature for agent selection in workflows. The complexity comes from implementing sophisticated matching algorithms, capability versioning, and negotiation protocols. It requires deep understanding of the agent capability model and careful testing with complex capability requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the monitoring system implementation into specific subtasks, including metrics collection architecture design, performance monitoring implementation, error tracking and aggregation, dashboard creation, alerting system, resource usage monitoring, and log aggregation. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.

It requires integration with multiple system components and careful performance testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Google Cloud integration enhancement task into specific subtasks, including code review, API version updates, authentication improvements, support for additional Vertex AI models, batching implementation, error handling, and documentation. For each subtask, provide detailed acceptance criteria and testing instructions.

The complexity comes from working with multiple external APIs (Vertex AI and Gmail) and implementing proper authentication, batching, and error handling. It requires understanding of Google Cloud APIs and careful testing with API mocks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the advanced workflow features implementation into specific subtasks, including extended workflow definition format, conditional branching, parallel execution support, dynamic workflow modification, templates and reusable components, versioning and migration, and visual editor creation. It requires deep understanding of workflow execution models and careful testing of complex scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the documentation system implementation into specific subtasks, including documentation structure design, automatic API documentation generation, tutorial creation, best practices documentation, example creation, troubleshooting guide development, and search functionality implementation. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the GoAPIClient implementation task into specific subtasks, including client class creation with all required endpoints, authentication implementation, parameter validation, error handling with retry logic, logging implementation, and documentation. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Midjourney tool wrappers implementation task into specific subtasks, including base class creation, individual tool wrapper implementations, parameter validation, version-specific handling, factory class creation, and configuration system.
